summary: This is a Zoom meeting invitation and notice for the removal hearing of Ghislaine Maxwell (case 20mj132-01) scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 p.m. It contains detailed instructions for remote access via video or telephone conference, along with court rules prohibiting recording or broadcasting of the proceedings.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the removal hearing (case 20mj132-01) for which this meeting notice was created.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Removal Hearing
events.description: A court removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell (case 20mj132-01) scheduled for 3:30 p.m., to be conducted remotely via Zoom and telephone conference.

keyFacts: A removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell (case 20mj132-01) was scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 p.m.
The hearing was conducted remotely via ZoomGov, with strict access controls allowing only necessary case participants on video, while others could join by telephone.
The notice explicitly prohibits photographing, broadcasting, or televising the remote court proceedings, applying to counsel, parties, media, and the public.
